fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Trained: Your hand size is 6. You start with an extra card combine.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Search: Pick two cards in your hand. Discard them and draw 2 cards. [Infinite, 2 CD] 
- Reconstitute: Discard 2 cards. Gain a non-special item card of your choice. [Infinite, 2 CD]
- Supplies: Discard your hand at the start of the following phase (excluding satcheled cards). Draw Satcheled cards equal to the amount you discarded at the start of the phase after the next. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D2] 
- Retrieve: Gain a card you discarded using your abilities. Cannot be the same card twice. [2 uses, 2 CD]
